short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: To-do list for your new tab page.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Draggable Todo is a clean, simple, but fast and powerful to-do list for Chrome browser's new tab. You can easily create or edit your task, add tasks with links, and even drag tasks to sort as you want.

What's cool?
â€¢ Beautiful confetti animation
â€¢ "Zelda: Breath of the Wild" task accomplishment sound
â€¢ Easily drag tasks
â€¢ Markdown link syntax support: [content](website link)
â€¢ Runs offline and automatically saves tasks
â€¢ Super autofocus on new task input
â€¢ Completely FREE

You can benefit from this extension if you:
â€¢ Have a to-do, action, follow-up or just an interesting item to jot down 
â€¢ Want to check your personal to-do list
â€¢ Feel like youâ€™re always forgetting something

All you have to do is open a new tab, and your item is there. Write, read, cross out. It's that simple. Now start adding your first task! ğŸ™‚
